title: Settings
description: Manage your account settings and preferences.
sections.title: Settings Sections
security.title: Security
security.description: Manage your security settings and two-factor authentication.
security.password.title: Password
security.password.description: Change your password here. It's recommended to use a strong, unique password.
security.password.success_description: Your password has been successfully changed.
security.face_id_description: Manage your Face ID for secure, passwordless event check-ins.
security.face_id.delete_confirm_descript: This will remove your stored Face ID data. You will need to re-enroll to use Face ID again.
security.face_id.delete_success_descript: Your Face ID data has been removed.
security.face_id.delete_error_descriptio: Failed to delete Face ID data.
security.two_factor.title: Two-Factor Authentication
security.two_factor.description: Add an additional layer of security to your account.
security.face_id_enrolled_text: You have already enrolled your face for FaceID check-ins.
security.face_id_not_enrolled_text: Enroll your face to enable faster, more secure event check-ins.
security.face_id.dialog_description: Center your face in the frame and follow the instructions.
security.face_id.camera_error: Could not access camera. Please check permissions.
security.face_id.challenge_failed: Could not start enrollment. Please try again.
security.face_id.challenges.right: Turn your head to the right
